caption:
“The sacred hides in the secular.”

Reflection:
The divine lingers in the hum of daily life — in steam rising from coffee, in quiet moments between meetings.

Commentary:
This reflection reminds us that God dwells in ordinary spaces. Spiritual life and daily life are not separate journeys but one sacred road.
